workflow.description: Task coordination for Claude Code instances
steps: 1. Read tasks.json and find an unclaimed 'pending' task
2. Set status to 'in_progress', add your instance ID as 'owner', set 'lockedAt' timestamp
3. Complete the work described in the task
5. Create a new test task for the completed item (see testTaskTemplate)

testTaskTemplate.description: After completing a task, create a test task using Chrome DevTools MCP
tools: mcp__chrome-devtools__click / fill - Interact with UI elements

tasks.subject: Example: Add login button to header
tasks.description: Add a login button to the main header component that redirects to /login

tasks.subject: Test: Login button in header
tasks.description: Verify login button works using Chrome DevTools MCP
testSteps: Take snapshot and verify login button exists with uid
